verbs.description: [ARG0: Putin] [ARGM-DIS: simply] [V: wants] [ARG1: to make the world safe for his mafia state] . Trump is no more than a means to that end .
[ARG0: Putin] simply wants to [V: make] [ARG1: the world safe for his mafia state] . Trump is no more than a means to that end .
Putin simply wants to make the world safe for his mafia state . [ARG1: Trump] [V: is] [ARG2: no more than a means to that end] .
